title: Customizable Activity Reminders
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to set customizable reminders for my patients' physical and cognitive activities, so that I can ensure they remain engaged and stimulated without disrupting their routines.

title: Visual Progress Reports for Health Tracking
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to access visual progress reports of my patients' physical and cognitive activities so that I can analyze health trends over time and provide better care strategies.

title: Personalized Activity Recommendations – Tailored Activity Suggestions Based on Health Data
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to recommend personalized activities for my socially isolated patients based on their health data so that I can support their physical and cognitive health while enhancing their social engagement.
